# Browse Our Materials

## Courses & Tutorials

```{r eval=TRUE}
dt <- DT::datatable(
  make_collection_table(include = c("course")),
  #extensions = c("SearchBuilder", "DateTime"),
  escape = FALSE,
  # Make cell values html enabled
  rownames = FALSE,
  # Remove 1, 2, 3 labels
  options = list(
    autowidth = TRUE,
    search = list(regex = TRUE),
    pageLength = 100, # Show 100 results
    dom = 'ft', # Don't allow to change how many results are displayed
    # dom = "Qlfrtip",
    # searchBuilder = TRUE,
    search = list(return = TRUE)
  )
)
dt
```
